definitions.text: of no importance or relevance especially to a law case
examples: an objection that is immaterial after the fact

definitions.text: not pertinent to the matter under consideration
examples: an issue extraneous to the debate
mentioned several impertinent facts before finally coming to the point

definitions.text: (often followed by `to') lacking importance; not mattering one way or the other
examples: whether you choose to do it or not is a matter that is quite immaterial (or indifferent)
what others think is altogether indifferent to him
